name: No Crying in Baseball
description:
Welcome to No Crying In Baseball!

In No Crying in Baseball, play as a little league baseball player going to one of his practices. The catch is, your father has finally, finally showed up to practice this time! You're so emotional that you could cry! But, your dad always told you, "There's no crying in baseball, son." Maintain your composure as you play this home-run derby! But beware, it gets harder as you go, and the pitcher doesn't play fair. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

  • Left click to swing. Aim for the marker . Hit the ball  at the right time and score more points!
  • Hold Spacebar to raise the emotion meter. Release it to lower the emotion meter. Keep the meter in the middle!
  • Hit Enter to progress through some screens, like the tutorial and game over screen.
